title: [Large-scale] Generative AI-based Pre-service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical knowledge and understanding of social studies content
context.additional_context: Developing instructional design competencies using generative AI in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, aiming to cultivate creative problem-solving skills applicable to social studies education

learning_goals: Can explain the social studies instructional design process with over 80% accuracy using generative AI.
Can critically analyze AI-generated content and evaluate its educational context suitability using a 3-tier rubric.
Over 90% of learners can draft social studies lesson plans using generative tools like ChatGPT in smartphone environments.
Can apply metacognitive strategies in AI-supported instructional design processes and write reflective journals at least four times.

resources: Social studies standard instructional design template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
